actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the rate of tax on liquefied natural gas shall be equivalent to the rate of tax on compressed natural gas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the rate of tax on liquefied natural gas shall be equivalent to the rate of tax on compressed natural gas.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the rate of tax on liquefied natural gas shall be equivalent to the rate of tax on compressed natural gas.
